metadata.title: CVE-2018-16597 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.8. Incorrect accesschecking in overlayfs mounts could be used by local attackers to modify ortruncate files in the underlying filesystem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16597` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
